opinion.case_name: Ponderosa Dairy v. Lyons, Secretary, California Department of Food and Agriculture

opinion:
537 U.S. 1099

PONDEROSA DAIRY ET AL.
v.
LYONS, SECRETARY, CALIFORNIA DEPARTMENT OF FOOD AND AGRICULTURE, ET AL.

No. 01-1018.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 10, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE NINTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 9th Cir. Certiorari granted, cases consolidated, and a total of one hour allotted for oral argument. Reported below: 259 F.3d 1148.
